Welcome.

I am Yaowen Ye (Elwin, or å¶è€€æ–‡), a junior majoring in Computer Science at the University of Hong Kong. Currently, I am an exchange student at UC Berkeley. I have been deeply intrigued by machine intelligence and AI alignment research and will devote myself to these fantastic fields in my future career. I am fortunated to be supervised by Dr. Chao Huang at HKU and Dr. Yixin Zhu at PKU CoRe Lab at Peking University. Currently, I am working on weak-to-strong generalization in Prof. Jacob Steinhardt's group.
